column1: Uchi////Service was also fantastic.  At the bar
column2: my friend and I got scooted over one seat in the middle of our meal
column3: and they provided an extra dish for us on the house.  If I could
column4: I'd do it over and over and over again.  It was the Hamachi Nabe
column5: and it was absolutely delicious.  One of the highlights of our meal
column6: along with the ham and egg roll and fried milk.
